title: Stunning 3 Bedroom/2 Bath Available! Indoor Parking | 24/7 Doorman
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Spacious, One of a Kind 3 Bedroom/2 Bath!   151 N Michigan Ave, Chicago IL 60601   Great City Views, Ton of Closet Space, Stainless Kitchen Appliances, Complimentary Internet and DirecTV cable! Wait there is MORE! Amazing Complimentary Amenities Include: 3 Business Centers, Yoga Studio, Gym, Indoor Pool, Rooftop Sundeck, Bike Storage, 24/7 Doorman   Millennium Park Plaza is one of Chicago's premier downtown buildings not only for its elite zip code but also because of the pristine apartments that offer spacious bedrooms and kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.     》SIZE: 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath  》INTERNET:  COMPLIMENTARY 》DIRECT TV:  COMPLIMENTARY 》ELECTRIC:  TENANT PAYS 》HEATING/AC:  ELECTRIC 》PARKING: VALET PARKING $260/MONTH    Apartment Features    The open floor plan allow plenty of room for entertaining, while still being right in the heart of downtown   Large windows, which means plenty of sunlight Full size stainless steel kitchen appliances Beautiful laminate hardwood floors  Tons of closet space Welcoming open kitchen layout I look forward to helping you find your next home!  Heather Pozzi  Leasing Consultant  Millennium Park Living, Inc.   Prices are subject to change  Equal housing opportunity
